LanguageData.ZP_SuperiorStrawBed.label: Superior straw bed
LanguageData.ZP_SuperiorStrawBed.description: A straw bed with an added sheet for comfort.\nDespite improvements, the quality still falls a bit short to normal beds.

LanguageData.ZP_SuperiorStrawBed_Frame.description: A straw bed with an added sheet for comfort.\nDespite improvements, the quality still falls a bit short to normal beds.

LanguageData.ZP_Ofuton.label: Futon
LanguageData.ZP_Ofuton.description: This traditional Japanese bed contains a mattress, comforter, and pillow; each is covered in cloth and typically filled with feathers or cotton.

LanguageData.ZP_DoubleOfuton.description: A simple double-wide futon that fits two people.
